detaileddescription.para: Determines frequency-dependent operating state. Use of intervals because of measuring and signal inaccuracy

parameterdescription.para: period of captured signal in [1/75 ms], type uint32_t
cyclic call time of IR155_MeasureResistance function

briefdescription.para: Interface function which delivers the actual signal measurement (duty cyle) and evaluation. Use of intervals because of measuring and signal inaccuracy. The evaluated results are finally written in the database.

parameterdescription.para: pointer where to write measurement state into
pointer where to write measured resistance into

simplesect.para: E_OK if no error occurred, otherwise E_NOT_OK
